name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Classic World 1-1
storyline: See where all of Mario and Luigi's adventures began, and find the first-ever 1-Up Mushroom!
summary: Classic World 1-1 is an e-Reader level for Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It is a remake of the first level (1-1) from Super Mario Bros. Its difficulty rating is of one star out of five. This card was released as series one in North America.
